name: Krampus is Home
detailed_description:
This game is a very atmospheric experience which focuses on stealth mechanics and survival strategies, the enemies have been developed with advanced artificial intelligence thus they are very unpredictable, there are jumpscares in this game.

KEY FEATURES

- First person shooter.

- Complex and challenging survival strategies.

- Cinematic visuals.

- Story-driven game play.

- Advanced AI.

- Jump scares.


FUTURE VERSIONS SHOULD HAVE

​- Continued story.

- New gameplay modes.

- Other languages.

- full gamepad support.

short_description: A survival horror experience. Sebastian is a teenager who is alone in his house on a cold christmas night, he is waiting for his parents to come back. Soon he realizes that there is something evil lurking around.
supported_languages:
English*, Simplified Chinese, Russian, Portuguese - Brazil, German, Korean, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 10.
  • Processor: 2.3 GHz Dual Core.
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 610M or equivalent.
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
